title: Project Update: Q3 Report
content: The quarterly report is now available for review. Please check the attached documents and provide feedback by Friday.

title: Meeting Reminder: Team Standup
content: This is a reminder that we have our weekly team standup tomorrow at 10:00 AM in the main conference room. Please prepare your status updates.

title: New Feature Request
content: Client has requested a new dashboard feature that allows filtering by date range. Please add this to the backlog for discussion during sprint planning.
